thread.title: BRIEF-SAIC Awarded Purchase Agreement, $74 Mln Task Order By U.S. Dept. Of Health And Human Services

title: BRIEF-SAIC Awarded Purchase Agreement, $74 Mln Task Order By U.S. Dept. Of Health And Human Services

organizations.name: u.s. dept. of health and human services
health and human services reuters staff

text:
37 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-SAIC Awarded Purchase Agreement, $74 Mln Task Order By U.S. Dept. Of Health And Human Services Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Jan 25 (Reuters) - Science Applications International Corp : 
* SAIC AWARDED NEXT GENERATION IT SERVICES OPERATIONS SERVICES BLANKET PURCHASE AGREEMENT AND $74 MILLION TASK ORDER BY THE U.S. DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
